name: Aditi

services.title: Leadership
services.description: A leader is best when people barely know he exists, when his work is done, his aim fulfilled, they will say: we did it ourselves. ~ Lao Tzu

services.title: Management
services.description: Good management consists of showing average people how to do the work of superior people. ~ John D. Rockefeller.

services.title: Excel
services.description: Microsoft Excel is a spreadsheet developed by Microsoft. Tt can display data as line graphs, histograms and charts, and with a very limited three-dimensional graphical display.

aboutpara: My name is Aditi Singh pursuing Master of Business Administration from ITM group of Institutions. born and bought up in the city Prayagraj , which is known for the place of offering. Currently living in Mumbai know as the city of dreams , came here for my post graduation degree in MBA . This place has given me good friends and, some life lessons. Made me understand it is so hard to be far away from your loved ones.
